rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS: Object that has some OMPD: Resource Role
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS: Object that has some OMPD: Resource Role
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a crane, welding rods, a multi-meter, mechanic
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Resource
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a tool, material, equipment or person required to complete a maintenance task

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:Role that is the role of the item that work is performed on in a OMPD:MaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:Role that is the role of the item that work is performed on in a OMPD:MaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a pump has the maintainable material item role when it is undergoing repair after a failure, a bearing has a maintainable material item role when it is been lubricated as part of a preventative maintenance program
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintainableItemRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: role played by an item when there is a maintenance strategy describing how it is to be maintained (IOF Core Ontology)

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:PhysicalObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:PhysicalObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: sheet metal, oil, lubricant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Material
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: items (generally consumables) that are required for the maintenance procedure to be executed that cannot be individually described according to its primary function (generally consumables).

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS: Activity, intended to repair or restore an item to a state in which it can perform its required function
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS: Activity, intended to repair or restore an item to a state in which it can perform its required function
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: repair the laptop, replace the window frame, inspect the fluid level
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: the activities involved in restoring or retaining the function of an item (IOF Maintenance Reference Ontology)

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:InformationObject has some proc:MediaType and is part of some OMPD:MaintenanceTaskDescription
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:InformationObject has some proc:MediaType and is part of some OMPD:MaintenanceTaskDescription
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: An image of the engine that is being worked on in a "disassemble the engine" maintenance task.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceTaskDescriptionMedia
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: an descriptive information object of one media type that forms part of a maintenance task description

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An OMPD:MaintenanceProcess that is represented in some OMPD:MaintenanceProcedureDocument and has activity part some OMPD:MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An OMPD:MaintenanceProcess that is represented in some OMPD:MaintenanceProcedureDocument and has activity part some OMPD:MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: engine replacement process
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceProcedureProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a process containing the steps described in the maintenance procedure as activity parts

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Maintenance Procedures - Static Procedure Ontology
rdf:Description.dcterms:creator: The University of Western Australia & Equonto Pty. Ltd.
rdf:Description.dcterms:contributor: Tim French: The University of Western Australia
Caitlin Woods: The University of Western Australia and Equonto
Melinda Hodkiewicz: The University of Western Australia
rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Ontology for Maintenance Procedure Documentation (OMPD) Static Procedure Ontology
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: The OMPD Static Procedure Ontology captures static information (i.e. non-temporal) captured in industrial maintenance procedures. This ontology captures information currently stored in maintenance procedure documentation in a generalizable way and supports its core users (maintenance technicians, maintenance engineers and maintenance schedulers) in their work. This ontology can be used alongside the Conditional Maintenance Task Ontology (https://spec.equonto.com/ontology/maintenance-procedure/conditional-maintenance-task-ontology/) for a more detailed description of maintenance procedures. Users can find details of the design methodology for this ontology at https://content.iospress.com/articles/applied-ontology/ao230279

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:InformationObject that is about some OMPD:MaineanceProcedureProcess
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:InformationObject that is about some OMPD:MaineanceProcedureProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a document describing how to change the oil in the car, or to replace the coupling on a pump
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceProcedureDocument
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a digital or paper document describing a task or set of tasks for a maintainer to perform

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:Quality that is beared by zero or more OMPD:QualitifiedPerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:Quality that is beared by zero or more OMPD:QualitifiedPerson
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: an electrical engineering qualification, a welding certificate
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Qualification
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a capability of an individual to perform a specific task that has been assessed by a recognised 3rd party group

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS: Realizeable Entity that is realizrd in some OMPD: Hazard Realization Process
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS: Realizeable Entity that is realizrd in some OMPD: Hazard Realization Process
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: oil on the floor, a heavy object that needs to be moved, a high pressure pipe
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Hazard
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: source or situation with a potential to cause injury and ill health (ISO 45001:2018)

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:Role that is the role of an LIS:Object that is required to execute some LIS:Activity
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:Role that is the role of an LIS:Object that is required to execute some LIS:Activity
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a spanner has a resource role when it is required for disassembling an engine
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ResourceRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: the role played by an object when it is required in the execution of a the maintenance task (and is not the equipment being worked on)

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:InformationObject that is a type of media
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:InformationObject that is a type of media
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: image, text, video
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MediaType
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: the format of a section of a maintenance procedure that describes an individual task in the process

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:Person that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole and has a OMPD:Qualification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:Person that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole and has a OMPD:Qualification
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a mechanical engineer, an electrician, a machinist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: QualifiedPerson
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: the person recognised by a 3rd party group as having a specific capability

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:PhysicalObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:PhysicalObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a circuit board, a pump shaft, a resistor, a cable
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Component
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: an item of hardware, software or both that can be individually described and has a required function

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:PhysicalObject that partiticipates in some OMPD:MaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:PhysicalObject that partiticipates in some OMPD:MaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ItemInMaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a physical object that is involved in some part of a maintenance task

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS: Activity that has the potential to cause harm
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS: Activity that has the potential to cause harm
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a slip on the oil, the lifting of the too-heavy object, the unconstrained release of pressure
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HazardRealizationProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: the process in which the hazard is realised and harm occurs

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:Activity that is a maintenance activity or a supporting activity involved in execution of a maintenance task
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:Activity that is a maintenance activity or a supporting activity involved in execution of a maintenance task
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: repair, replace, lubricate, clean, move
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceAction
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a context-agnostic maintenance activity or supporting activity that is described within a maintenance task

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:InformationObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:InformationObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: confined space entry permit, hot work permit
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Permit
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a document containing approval to progress a task

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: A LIS:PhysicalObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A LIS:PhysicalObject that may have some OMPD:ResourceRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a wrench, a hammer, a screwdriver
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tool
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a physical object designed to perform a specific function involved in a maintenance task, usually hand-held

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:InformationObject that is about some OMPD:MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:InformationObject that is about some OMPD:MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: the section in a maintenance procedure description that describes an individual task in the process
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceTaskDescription
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: the part of a document containing instructions for performing a maintenance task

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An LIS:PhysicalObject hat has a role OMPD:MaintainableItemRole
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An LIS:PhysicalObject hat has a role OMPD:MaintainableItemRole
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a mechanical seal, a motor, tyres on a car
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintainableItem
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: an item (system or component) for which a maintenance strategy has been identified (IOF Core Ontology)

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An OMPD:MaintenanceProcess that is: - a direct activity part of zero or one OMPD:MaintenanceProcedureProcess - an activity part of zero or more OMPD:MaintenanceProcedureProcess - a direct activity part of zero or one OMPD:MaintenanceTask - an activity part of zero or more OMPD:MaintenanceTask - occurs directly before zero or one Maintenance task - occurs before zero or more MaintenanceTask - occurs directly after zero or one MaintenanceTask - occurs after zero or more OMPD:MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An OMPD:MaintenanceProcess that is: - a direct activity part of zero or one OMPD:MaintenanceProcedureProcess - an activity part of zero or more OMPD:MaintenanceProcedureProcess - a direct activity part of zero or one OMPD:MaintenanceTask - an activity part of zero or more OMPD:MaintenanceTask - occurs directly before zero or one Maintenance task - occurs before zero or more MaintenanceTask - occurs directly after zero or one MaintenanceTask - occurs after zero or more OMPD:MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: shut-off the valve, remove the bolts from the cover, replace the shaft
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MaintenanceTask
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: a discrete activity within a multi-step maintenance process

rdf:Description.iof-av:semiFormalNaturalLanguageAxioms: An OMPD: Hazard that is realized in some OMPD: Hazard Realization Process that occurs relative to some OMPD: Maintenance Process
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An OMPD: Hazard that is realized in some OMPD: Hazard Realization Process that occurs relative to some OMPD: Maintenance Process
rdf:Description.iof-av:example: a confined space, working at heights, pressurised containers
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HazardInMaintenanceProcess
rdf:Description.iof-av:subjectMatterExpertExplanation: source or situation with a potential to cause injury and ill health identified in a maintenance procedure (ISO 45001:2018)
